oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stereoselective Synthesis of cis-2,6-Disubstituted Morpholines and 1,4-Oxathianes by Intramolecular Reductive Etherification of 1,5-Diketones
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GHARPURE, SJ
ANURADHA, D
PRASAD, JVK
RAO, PS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 2,6-DISUBSTITUTED MORPHOLINES
GLYCOSYL DONORS
CYCLIC ETHERS
ENANTIOSELECTIVE SYNTHESIS
PSEUDOAXIAL CONFORMERS
FACILE PREPARATION
OXOCARBENIUM IONS
SULFUR-DIOXIDE
DERIVATIVES
OXATHIANE
Morpholines
4-Oxathianes
Diketones
Lewis acids
Reductive etherification
Natural products
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simple and efficient, Lewis acid catalysed reductive etherification strategy for the stereoselective synthesis of cis-2,6-disubstituted morpholines and 1,4-oxathianes starting from readily available 1,5-diketones has been developed. The strategy is used in the total synthesis of morpholine-based natural products (+/-)-chelonin A and formal total synthesis of (+/-)-chelonin C.
